hackathon-description-text: The promise of augmented and virtual reality has been long in coming, and the technology has finally reached a level where broad applications are now possible. From entertainment through gaming and video to new user interfaces and data visualization, we’re hacking solutions for 32 hours to find new applications and approaches.
hackathon-eligibility: All participants are welcome as long as they are 18 years or older.
hackathon-requirements: All submissions need to be posted to DevPost by Sunday, April 17th by 2pm in order to be considered for judging. Documentation is a key peice of the judging process, so please make it great!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The attendees will be able to vote on the best overall project at the hackathon, the winner gets the Peoples choice award!

hackathon-description-header: Create games and Augmented/Virtual Reality applications at the TVCOG!
